actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to increase the unearned income limitation governing the payment of pensions to certain children of deceased veterans.

summary.text: Increases from $2,000 to $2,600 the unearned income limitation governing the payment of pensions to children of deceased veterans of the Mexican border period, World War I, World War II, the Korean conflict, or the Vietnam era. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 542(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to increase the unearned income limitation governing the payment of pensions to certain children of deceased veterans.
